post.author: thomas lee
post.content:
Min Kim will do EIA presentation on early part of May. I thought it will help to understand it better with XP methodology session.
objevtive : XP methodology presentation plus why do we need another methodology now ? Materials : XP, Six thinking Hats and Smart Choices
Date : April 17th Thursday day before Good Friday Time : 8:00 PM Place : 가정집제공할분을 찾음...정없으면... StorageASP 저희 집 괜찮습니다.(최덕선) 1228 Garcia st. Mississauga 지도 올리는 법 좀 알켜주세요. 잘 모르겠네요.
Password : you know !
List of Name ------------ 이인석 황성규 이계영 염희경 홍영기 최덕선 이성기 홍대의
post.title: eXtreme programming with kicks methodology
